column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The tapas . . . $3 tapas for happy hour
column2: made this a happy TWO hours! It wouldn't be a Yelp review if I didn't mention the savory
column4: juicy BACON WRAPPED DATES. So simple
column5: yet sooo delicious. Enigmatic little nips of goodness. Crunchy
column7: and plump-when-you-cook 'em dates. Sinful. But who doesn't love to sin
